title: Lost IP overnight?
body:
I have been saving up to buy Ivern, and last night i was at 6170 IP, almost played a few more games to get it, but instead decided to go to bed.  I log in today and have a balance of 6013!  I mean, that's not a huge loss of IP, but I wonder how long this has been going on, and over the course of the 3-4 years I have played this game, how much IP has been deducted when i wasn't looking?
Maybe this is a bug, but i know I had 6170 IP before i closed my client last night.  Anyone else have this issue?

replies.body: Looking into this for you, I wasn't able to see anything out of the ordinary or IP just disappearing.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can look into this with you individually.  We'll be able to give you context on your IP.  We'll reply back asap!
thank you for the response, and now i have gotten above 6300 IP but cannot purchase ivern.....

Are you on the updated client?  Hop back on the legacy client in case you balance isn't sync'd up.  

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

If you still run into any problems, hit us up in a ticket so we can check it out.

Hey, this is just something that I have had a problem with and you mentioned it in the post
When I use the legacy launcher, it brings up the normal launcher but when I hit the orange button at the top it brings me to the updated client.

I am on the updated client.  I have played another game, and it shows i have more than enough IP, then if I try to purchase, I cannot.  I log out and log in, and the IP goes below what I need.  It's something on your end,  a minor bug, but maybe something you should look into. I took photos with my phone it goes from showing 6424 to 6267 upon restarting the client. I put a ticket in. I am not so upset over the issue that it ruins my day, just something I noticed and maybe something you guys can fix so other people do not feel like they are being cheated.
